mt.server

Class MicroServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mt.server.MicroServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MicroTraderServer

    public class MicroServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MicroTraderServer
    MicroTraderServer implementation. This class should be responsible to do the business logic of stock transactions between buyers and sellers.
    Author:
    Group 78

      • start

        public void start(mt.comm.ServerComm serverComm)
        Description copied from interface: MicroTraderServer
        Starts the server. Should only exit when the server quits.
        Specified by:
        start in interface MicroTraderServer
        Parameters:
        serverComm - the object through which all communication with clients should take place.

      • notifyAllClients

        private void notifyAllClients(mt.Order order)

        Notifies all clients about a new order
        Parameters:
